items.title: Is Destiny 2’s 450 Power Grind The Worst Ever, Or Just In 11 Years?
items.description: Destiny 2 may have introduced the worst grind in the history of the series with the push to 450, and that is saying something.

items.title: From ‘Superman’ To ‘Fantastic Four,’ It’s The Worst-Performing Superhero Year Since 2011
items.description: Despite a number of good superhero movies, this is the worst year at the box office for the genre in 14 years.
